last_episode_to_air.name: Showdown
last_episode_to_air.overview: Betrayals run deep as Ferry earns some quick cash, Leyla plots an escape and Bob realizes what he'll need to do to keep his growing family safe.

name: Undercover
overview: Undercover agents infiltrate a drug kingpin's operation by posing as a couple at the campground where he spends his weekends. Inspired by real events.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: One of the largest ecstasy producers in the world, Dutchman Ferry Bouman, lives a charmed life in his villa on the Dutch-Belgian border. But things start to change when two undercover agents move into his territory, attempt to infiltrate Bouman’s life and shut down his network.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After the events of season one, Kim starts working at Human Rights. With help from former colleague Bob, her investigation into illegal Syrian weapons trade leads her to the El Dorado Ranch, a western horse ranch. Bob goes undercover to earn the trust of the brothers Berger, ranch owners & arms dealers. Meanwhile, Ferry Bouman continues his search for undercover agents Kim & Bob from jail…

episodes.name: Camping Zonnedauw
episodes.overview: After embarking on their undercover assignment, agents Bob and Kim clash over how to initiate contact with their target and new neighbor, Ferry Bouman.

episodes.name: Highly Sensitive
episodes.overview: Attempts to make inroads with Ferry hit a roadblock when Bob antagonizes a member of his crew and a secondary operation spins out of control.

episodes.name: Italian Designer Drugs
episodes.overview: When Bob's temper endangers the mission, he works to spin the situation to his advantage. Kim reaches out to Danielle over a personal matter.

episodes.name: Legio Patria Nostra
episodes.overview: Trust issues crop up everywhere as John questions Ferry's faith in Bob, Ferry worries about Jurgen's loyalty, and Bob lets his wife down yet again.

episodes.name: Across the Border
episodes.overview: Bob sets out to pick up Ferry's merchandise but runs into trouble along the way. Back home, his concerned colleagues debate over whether to intervene.

episodes.name: Sirens
episodes.overview: A drug deal with a new associate leaves Ferry and John on edge. Bob and Kim feel the effects of their forced closeness. Danielle breaks into her stash.

episodes.name: That Cop's Face
episodes.overview: Ferry's close call sends John and Bob hunting for the person responsible. Meanwhile, Kim toys with Danielle's affections to help the case.

episodes.name: Nouveau Monde
episodes.overview: The tension between Bob and John comes to a head during a drug negotiation in France disguised as a couples' getaway. Kim ups the ante with Danielle.

episodes.name: Rock Bottom
episodes.overview: Unable to let the case go, Bob figures out another way to lure Ferry, but Kim feels uneasy once the targets are identified.

episodes.name: Showtime
episodes.overview: Amid what should be a happy occasion, Bob sets a drug buy in motion with Ferry's blessing. Back at the campsite, Danielle gets a bad feeling about Kim.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: One of the largest ecstasy producers in the world, Dutchman Ferry Bouman, lives a charmed life in his villa on the Dutch-Belgian border. But things start to change when two undercover agents move into his territory, attempt to infiltrate Bouman’s life and shut down his network.

episodes.name: El Dorado
episodes.overview: Bob Lemmens tracks down some arms dealers.

episodes.name: Pentagon
episodes.overview: The Berger brothers quickly reveal their true nature.

episodes.name: Soldiers of Love
episodes.overview: As Bob stews over a setback in the case, his daughter brushes up against his past, and the Bergers attempt to salvage a lucrative business deal.

episodes.name: Trojan Horse Power
episodes.overview: The lure of a fresh start leaves Nathalie feeling conflicted and vulnerable, while Bob pushes for a breakthrough in the case before his time runs out.

episodes.name: Revolution
episodes.overview: Bob tries to make a deal with Laurent and JP Berger.

episodes.name: Victor
episodes.overview: Bob's attempt to use JP's past against him becomes a game of cat and mouse, Laurent's doubts about Nathalie boil over and Ferry issues an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Enrichochet
episodes.overview: When Nathalie's run-in with Laurent leaves Bob's case hanging by a thread, he bends the rules to the breaking point to motivate JP to make a deal.

episodes.name: Roadblock
episodes.overview: Pushed to the brink by everything he's done in pursuit of Ferry and the Bergers, Bob races to contain and cover up his various deceptions.

episodes.name: Reconstruction
episodes.overview: With Ferry's court date fast approaching, Bob faces the truth and considers the consequences of his actions. Laurent tries to tell JP what he knows.

episodes.name: War
episodes.overview: As the case comes down to the wire, Bob scrambles to protect Nathalie while JP takes steps to exact retribution on Laurent's behalf.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: After the events of season one, Kim starts working at Human Rights. With help from former colleague Bob, her investigation into illegal Syrian weapons trade leads her to the El Dorado Ranch, a western horse ranch. Bob goes undercover to earn the trust of the brothers Berger, ranch owners & arms dealers. Meanwhile, Ferry Bouman continues his search for undercover agents Kim & Bob from jail…

episodes.name: Evil Eye
episodes.overview: Bob receives an offer from a former colleague that could solve all his problems — or cost him everything. Ferry makes a bumpy reentry into his old life.

episodes.name: Festival Shop Super Sales
episodes.overview: Animosity seethes between Bob and Ferry as they figure out the rules of their new venture. Questions of loyalty and trust trouble the Bulut family.

episodes.name: Trust Issues
episodes.overview: Leyla's cautious approach to business means Bob and Ferry must pass her tests to gain her trust. Timur faces a painful reckoning with his family.

episodes.name: All-in Resort
episodes.overview: As Bob and Ferry's problems in Turkey escalate, Patrick scrambles to cut a dangerous deal and Timur tries to sow suspicion between Leyla and Serkan.

episodes.name: Rat in the Kitchen
episodes.overview: Unsure who to trust, Peter reaches out to a former ally for help. Serkan's suspicions deepen. A distraught Danielle demands the truth from Ferry.

episodes.name: Pater Familias
episodes.overview: Tensions rise at Leyla and Serkan's family celebration as Bob and Ferry try to close the deal while a wary Timur digs for more information.

episodes.name: Total Loss
episodes.overview: With Timur stirring the pot, Serkan comes to a decision about the deal — and Leyla. Bob's uneasy arrangement with Ferry comes to a crashing halt.

episodes.name: Showdown
episodes.overview: Betrayals run deep as Ferry earns some quick cash, Leyla plots an escape and Bob realizes what he'll need to do to keep his growing family safe.
